stanza.line: Like as the waves make towards the pebbled (a)shore(/a)
So do our minutes hasten to their (b)end(/b)
Each changing place with that which goes (a)before(/a)
In sequent toil all forwards do (b)contend(/b)
Nativity once in the main of (c)light(/c)
And Time that gave doth now his gift (d)confound(/d)
Time doth transfix the flourish set on (e)youth(/e)
And delves the parallels in beauty's (f)brow(/f)
Feeds on the rarities of nature's (e)truth(/e)
And nothing stands but for his scythe to (f)mow(/f)
And yet to times in hope my verse shall (g)stand(/g)
Praising thy worth despite his cruel (g)hand(/g)
